favourite.article: O Lord! Amen! Thatâ€™s the way to let Him in. Hallelujah! I love to hear it. He who is joined to the Lord is one spirit.
We're so happy! Hallelujah! Taste and see!
O Lord! Amen! Hallelujah! Taste and see!

Praise the Lord! The Lord can get inside of me simply right now. It's very simple to be filled with Him. It is easy to be to take Him in by saying O Lord Jesus. (Just finished recent 6th Grade Conference)
Amen! Calling on the Lord is the best way to let Him in!!
Praise the Lord that our God today is the Spirit. Now He is living inside of us and filling us constantly. He also make us really happy... Hallelujah!
